none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on September 21, 2013 Description from Terminal Escape:
I played in Bangkok in 2006 (same tour I mentioned yesterday). Four fellows from Singapore came to see the show and hang out (the latter being much more awesome than the former) and they were nice as hell, just solid dudes and great to spend time with. And if this tape is any indication, I really wish we had stopped in Singapore on that tour in addition to Thailand (I made it there two years later with CONQUEST FOR DEATH, and it was great). STRONZA perfectly bridge the gap between early '00s fastcore/thrash and later '00s Scandinavian (by way of US basements) melodic crust. Defiantly feminist and proudly defiant in a place where that actually means something, STRONZA's approach to punk rock is...well, it's just right. Members went on to SLUTET and probably a load of other bands....fukk, I need to go to Asia again. STRONZA
//1.bp.blogspot.com/-EJSL7ZZrskw/Uj0qjOkWmtI/AAAAAAAAIqA/m1YbJOsrIEw/s1600/stronza+copy.jpg https://myspace.com/slutet/music/songs //3.bp.blogspot.com/-dpyc0B0HTs8/Uj02VCwilcI/AAAAAAAAIqQ/FCfQg5C561k/s1600/stronza+img+copy.jpg

seo.title: Stronza - Stronza cassette 2006 - Terminal Escape
